about_the_game:
Welcome to the world of Pussies Wrestling Dicks!
A unique and challenging puzzle game where you must use your drawing skills to get a fist to a target. Each level has its own difficulty, and every two levels you unlock a reward render that can be viewed in the gallery. There are 48 levels in total of varying difficulty.

The theme of this game is wrestling, so expect some sexy renders of muscular pair grappling with each other as you progress through the levels. The gameplay is simple but addictive - draw shapes onscreen to create paths for your fist, then watch it fly across the screen towards its targets. There's something immensely satisfying about watching your creation come alive and take down its opponent, especially when it's done in spectacular fashion. So put on your thinking cap and prepare yourself for some intense puzzling action!



Features:
  • 48 levels
  • Physics based puzzles based on drawing
  • Different mechanics (simple lines, solid shapes, ropes, removing of a drawing)
  • Visual novel elements of conversations between two couples - Carmel & Mahir and Milo & Harper
  • Sexy renders with a gallery
  • The levels are all very open to your own creativity and there are usually multiple ways to solve it

Gameplay:
  • Every level has a fist and a target
  • You must get the fist to the target and not drop out of screen
  • You can do it in whatever way you want
  • You can draw lines and shapes which are physically simulated - they fall down, they can push the fist, etc..

The wrestlers are sweaty and muscular. This makes for an incredibly sexy experience as you try to guide your fists towards their targets!

content_descriptors.notes: Contains images of sexually explicit content and nudity. The game also contains many fighting scenes with some amount of blood and light injuries. All sexual acts are consensual.

name: Pussies Wrestling Dicks

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad-core Intel or AMD, 2.5 GHz or faster
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Wrestling fans rejoice! Finally, there's a puzzle game that captures all the excitement of the ring as well as the beauty of muscular and sweaty bodies, pushing against each other! It is a sexy physics drawing game with realistic renders as well as pixel art retro graphics!
